original_text:
because he has covered his face with his fat
    and gathered fat upon his waist
korean_text: 그의 얼굴에는 살이 찌고 허리에는 기름이 엉기었고

sentences.original_text: because he has covered his face with his fat
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 자기 기름으로 얼굴을 덮었기 때문에

sentences.original_text: and gathered fat upon his waist
